sentences.english: Subspecies are often difficult to distinguish from one another.
sentences.chinese: 區分不同的亞種是很困難的。

sentences.english: Researchers have found a large subpopulation of the insect that prefers to live outside.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員發現了一種喜歡生活在室外的瘧蚊的亞種。

sentences.english: Reasons for the low translocation of the assimilate to grains of ISHR were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對亞種間雜種物質運轉率低的原因進行了討論。

sentences.english: Intersubspecific hybrid rice(ISHR) had high dry matter accumulation, especially in grain-filling stage.
sentences.chinese: 亞種間雜交稻幹物質積累較高，且主要表現在結實期。

sentences.english: Any unit used in the science of biological classification or taxonomy, which arranged in a hierarchy from kingdom to subspecies.
sentences.chinese: 從界至亞種之間被用以作爲生物科學分類之單位。

sentences.english: Of the eight known tiger subspecies only five remain.
sentences.chinese: 已知的八種虎類亞種中現僅存五種。

sentences.english: What are the subspecies (races) of the gray wolf?
The Quagga was a southern subspecies of the Plains Zebra.
sentences.chinese: 斑驢是南非草原斑馬的一個亞種。

sentences.english: Differences with regard to the incidence of natural inversion polymorphism are likely to exist between species as well as between sub-species.
sentences.chinese: 自然倒位多型性的發生率在種間以及亞種間可能不同。

sentences.english: The shells of the tortoises come in two basic varieties, dome-shaped and saddle-backed.
sentences.chinese: 這一亞種的巨龜有兩個基本的種羣，圓頂形和馬鞍型。

sentences.english: They found that the puddles contained two different subpopulations.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現這些水坑中有兩種不同的亞種。

sentences.english: This fish subspecies was originally found only in the outflows of North and South Tecopa Hot Springs.
sentences.chinese: 這類亞種魚最初只在南北提可巴溫泉的出流地帶發現。

sentences.english: A significantly negative correlation was found between PTI and most of subspecies characteristics.
sentences.chinese: PTI與大多數亞種特徵性狀呈顯著負相關。

sentences.english: Ice trolls are a subspecies of troll that lives in cold climates.
sentences.chinese: 冰霜巨魔是一種生活在寒冷氣候中的巨魔亞種。

sentences.english: Formenkreis A group of related allopatric species or subspecies.
sentences.chinese: 多型種一羣相關的異地種或亞種。

sentences.english: The average of medulla exponent from the bodies of two subspecies was also bigger than that of their forelegs.
sentences.chinese: 兩亞種軀幹部上毛髓質指數的平均值均明顯大於前肢。

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: Khmer kingdom of Kampuchea or Cambodia/Chinese term for Cambodia from 7th to 15th century
Altai republic in Russian central Asia, capital Gorno-Altaysk
Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
